lyrics.title: Mr Nobody
lyrics.content:
You, you came to me one night
Just like a ray of light
I thought we'd be forever

Now it's so clear to me
I'm part of history
You're leaving me in sorrow

So deeply, so badly, you're hurting me

Tell me, who's that lucky hero
Sleeping tightly on your pillow?
Ah… tell me, will it be forever?
'Cause when you look at me
I'm Mister Nobody
It's just a game you play
Can't let you walk away

Like a stranger passing by
With no more tears to dry
You're leaving me in sorrow

So deeply, so badly, you're hurting me

Tell me, who's that lucky hero
Sleeping tightly on your pillow?
Ah… tell me, will it be forever?
'Cause when you look at me
I'm Mister Nobody
It's just a game you play
Can't let you walk away

Tell me, who's that lucky hero
Sleeping tightly on your pillow?
Ah… tell me, will it be forever?
'Cause when you look at me
I'm Mister Nobody
It's juѕt a game you play
Can't let you walk awаy

lyrics.title: Srce od kristala
lyrics.content:
Ti predamnom stojiš
Kao da brojiš
Suze za izgovor

Ti pričaš mi priču
Sa rukom na licu
To pravi je odgovor

Za malo, za malo
Da ti vjerujem

Reci, znam da si mu dala
Svoje srce od kristala
Reci, slomila si sama
Sve što je vrijedelo
Sad je izblijedelo
I tvojih suza noćas ima premalo

K'o izdajnik, sama
A bila si dama
Još ti uzdah čujem

Za malo, za malo
Da ti vjerujem

Reci, znam da si mu dala
Svoje srce od kristala
Reci, slomila si sama
Sve što je vrijedelo
Sad je izblijedelo
I tvojih suza noćas ima premalo

Reci, znam da si mu dala
Svoje srce od kristala
Reci, slomila si sama
Sve što je vrijedelo
Sad je izblijedelo
I tvojih suza noćaѕ ima premаlo

lyrics.title: Plan B
lyrics.content:
Ti, v prazen zid strmis
Slutim, da bezis
Nemir drhti v tebi

Ti, lahko me zdaj izdas
A reci, da priznas
Ne najdes me v sebi
Vsaj malo, vsaj malo zacuti me

Reci
Me bos kdaj iskala
V srcu za menoj jokala

Reci
Se bos kdaj vrnila
Mogoce sem Plan b

Rezerva, ko ne gre
Alarm zazvoni, ko drug te zapusti
Kot judov je poljub
Poln vseh obljub
Ta dotik med nama
Vsaj malo, vsaj malo zacuti me

Reci
Me bos kdaj iskala
V srcu za menoj jokala

Reci
Se bos kdaj vrnila
Mogoce sem plan b
Rezerva, ko ne gre
Alarm zazvoni, ko drug te zаpuѕti
